heroSubtext: Panel upgrades, EV charger installs, lighting design, troubleshooting, and emergency calls. Serving St. John’s & surrounding areas with upfront pricing and on-time service.

services.title: EV Charger Installs
services.blurb: Home Level 2 chargers, proper permits & code.

services.title: Lighting & Recessed
services.blurb: Pot lights, pendants, dimmers, smart switches.

services.title: Troubleshooting & Repairs
services.blurb: No power, tripping breakers, GFCI issues.

services.title: Outdoor & Generators
services.blurb: Exterior lighting, hot tubs, backup power.

reasons.title: On-Time & Reliable
reasons.blurb: We show up when we say we will — with clear communication.

reasons.title: Licensed & Insured
reasons.blurb: Fully licensed, insured, and compliant with local code.

reasons.title: Upfront Pricing
reasons.blurb: Fair quotes before work begins. No surprise add-ons.

reasons.title: Workmanship Guarantee
reasons.blurb: We stand behind our work with a written warranty.

serviceAreasIntro: Proudly serving St. John’s metro and surrounding communities. If you don’t see your area, give us a call — we likely cover it.
serviceAreasMapAlt: Map of service coverage around St. John’s

financing.headline: Financing Available
financing.subtext: Break larger projects into easy monthly payments. Quick online approval, no obligation.
financing.disclaimer: Rates and terms shown are examples only and subject to credit approval from our financing partners.

emergency.headline: 24/7 Emergency Electrician
emergency.subtext: Power out? Breaker tripping? Burning smell? We’re on call nights, weekends, and holidays across St. John’s metro.
emergency.feeNote: After-hours dispatch fee may apply. Upfront pricing before any work begins.
